togglePaddingTop.fieldDescription: Switch between Default Padding (Off) and Reduced Padding (On)
togglePaddingTop.name: ./togglePaddingTop

togglePaddingBottom.fieldDescription: Switch between Default Padding (Off) and Reduced Padding (On)
togglePaddingBottom.name: ./togglePaddingBottom

greyBackground.fieldDescription: Check to enable Grey background color
greyBackground.name: ./greyBackground

loadInModal.fieldDescription: Check to open Request To Quote in modal
loadInModal.name: ./loadInModalTab1
loadInModal.text: Load Request Quote Form In Modal

imageDetails.fieldDescription: Add Image Details.(To split cells, author imageDetails twice with same Title and ImageUrl, rest different data).

titleText.fieldDescription: For section Id redirection, title needs to be same as Category info Title
titleText.name: ./titleText

openNewImageLinkTab.fieldDescription: Check to open link in New Tab. By default, link opens in same tab.
openNewImageLinkTab.name: ./openNewImageLinkTab

redirectLink.fieldDescription: If URL is authored, it will take precedence over section Id redirection.
redirectLink.name: ./redirectLink

subText.fieldDescription: Author Sub Text title only if cells needs split
subText.name: ./subText

rowDetails.fieldDescription: Author only Text if text needed, only Image if icon needed. Leave both empty if cell needs to be empty.
rowDetails.fieldLabel: Row Data (Author left cell Value uniformly across columns to maintain table intact)

textLeftAlignment.fieldDescription: Check to enable Text left alignment
textLeftAlignment.name: ./textLeftAlignment

openNewImagePathTab.fieldDescription: Check to open link in New Tab. By default, link opens in same tab.
openNewImagePathTab.name: ./openNewImagePathTab

loadInModal.fieldDescription: Check to open Request To Quote in modal
loadInModal.name: ./loadInModalTab2
loadInModal.text: Load Request Quote Form In Modal
